meanings.definition: A device used to maintain the shape of a shoe.
meanings.sent1: I bought new shoetrees to keep my shoes looking nice.
meanings.sent2: The shoetrees helped my shoes keep their form.
meanings.sent3: The shoetrees decided to have a race to see who could stretch the shoe the most.
meanings.sent4: Her shoetrees were like magic wands, transforming the shoes into perfect fits.
meanings.sent5: The shoetrees whispered to the shoes, 'Stay in shape and look great!'
